description: I never thought I'd laugh at a clock widget, sliding the slider to "fuzzy" and just being greeted with "Weekend!" absolutely sent me harder than anything I've seen all week, to whoever made this, thank you.
they work really hard on these apps. The nice to do is give them a review it only takes about 30 secs.
I like how this is made, but I don't use it as much because it doesn't fit my aesthetic. Still it's an awesome widget.
summary: It's a cool widget, love to see it

description: Liked it. KDE team is working great!

I like having a fuzzy text clock down by the panel. Who needs to know the time to the minute? And I appreciate the big calendar pop-up when I click it. I do wish it had more choice in font, and could go a bit smaller on the screen.
